name: Labyrinth of the Minotaur: Escape from Darkness - original survival horror 3D dark puzzle game - Haunted Halloween Edition
name_original: Labyrinth of the Minotaur: Escape from Darkness - original survival horror 3D dark puzzle game - Haunted Halloween Edition
description:
!!! MORE LABYRINTHS AND TRAPS IN FUTURE RELEASES !!!

Are you afraid of the dark?

This is what players say:
"The best horror game ever!"
"Too scared to play it..."
"I'm too afraid to play at night!"
"Five stars and definitely worth the monies."

"Labyrinth of the Minotaur: Escape from Darkness" is the original survival horror game based upon the Minotaur myth. See how long you can survive before Minotaur gets you, with only your torchlight to aid you! What's waiting for you at the exit of the Labyrinth?...

- 2 variants of Labyrinth of the Minotaur (full of traps of course):
Labyrinths recreated with great accuracy from the ancient frescoes, mosaics and manuscripts.

- Easy controls:
Use Joystick to move your character and Swipe to look around.

- Intense horror atmosphere, endless suspense in the best traditions of A. Hitchcock:
Hear frightening sound effects and terrifying music.
Feel the fear as the monster is coming closer and escape his deadly weapon. Find exit before the Minotaur takes you.

-Unity Engine powered graphics:
Special effects for newest Apple devices to create an even more intense atmosphere.

PS: The most scary game of all time... Shocking millions of players worldwide!
PPS: Use headphones for the best experience, ideally at night and alone!
